org.netbeans.spi.debugger

Interface BreakpointsActivationProvider


  • public interface BreakpointsActivationProvider
    Provider of debugger engine-related breakpoints activation/deactivation, which is independent on the enabled/disabled state. Register an implementation of this class for an appropriate debugger engine via DebuggerServiceRegistration annotation.
    Since:
    1.51

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
      Add a property change listener to be notified about ActiveBreakpoints.PROP_BREAKPOINTS_ACTIVE
      boolean areBreakpointsActive()
      Test if the engine's breakpoints are currently active.
      void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
      Remove a property change listener.
      void setBreakpointsActive(boolean active)
      Activate or deactivate breakpoints handled by this debugger engine.

    • Method Detail

      • areBreakpointsActive

        boolean areBreakpointsActive()
        Test if the engine's breakpoints are currently active.
        Returns:
        true when breakpoints are active, false otherwise.

      • setBreakpointsActive

        void setBreakpointsActive(boolean active)
        Activate or deactivate breakpoints handled by this debugger engine. The breakpoints activation/deactivation is independent on breakpoints enabled/disabled state.
        Parameters:
        active - true to activate breakpoints, false to deactivate them.

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Add a property change listener to be notified about ActiveBreakpoints.PROP_BREAKPOINTS_ACTIVE
        Parameters:
        l - a property change listener

      • removePropertyChangeListener

        void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Remove a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        l - a property change listener
